Posts.Content: Hi just been diagnosed with breast cancer,would like to talk to people who are going through the same thing
Posts.Title: Been diagnosed with breast cancer on Monday feeling a bit scared

Posts.Content: Hi Lisa thanks for replying I feel now  that I just want to get on with things ,once I get the CT scan and find out if it’s anywhere else I will feel better , I just feel in limbo just now so
